events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including the resume and cover letter.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's software development background and skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidate's application moving forward.
The recruiter conducted an initial phone screening to discuss the candidate's experience and assess overall fit for the software engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly to the recruiter's questions, expressing strong enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to evaluate their programming and problem-solving skills.
